bayspec.model.user.user module¶

class bayspec.model.user.user.user[source]¶

Bases: Model

func(E, T=None, O=None)[source]¶
Parameters:

  • E (energy array in keV)

  • T (time array in second)

  • O (useless now)

Returns:

  • if type is add or tinv

  • photon spectrum N(E, T) in photons/cm2/s/keV

  • if type is mul or math

  • dimensionless F(E, T)
